name: Hexahedron (Motato)
description:
Hexahedron is a level-based runner game. 

USE A KEY AND D KEY TO MOVE LEFT AND RIGHT

This game was made in under a week and is intended to be updated frequently with new gameplay elements and levels. This game was made as extra curricular work for ITEM. This game was developed by a 14 year old in their basement and any feedback whatsoever will be greatly appreciated. If you enjoy the game I encourage you to send this to your friends or family as the goal is 250 downloads.

Thank you
